name: gem-in-eer
description: Sound notification system for Gemini CLI, inspired by PeonPing.
author: Gem-in-eer Contributors

settings.name: Active Pack
settings.description: The character pack to use for sounds.

settings.name: Hook: Before Agent
settings.description: Enable sound before an agent starts (true/false).

settings.name: Hook: After Agent
settings.description: Enable sound after an agent finishes (true/false).

settings.name: Hook: Before Tool
settings.description: Enable sound before a tool is called (true/false).

settings.name: Hook: After Tool
settings.description: Enable sound after a tool finishes (true/false).
